ygData.subject: Re: Firey Avenger
ygData.msgSnippet: Look around, on web sites.  It is there.  Verant said it had been changed from Paladin only ... From: Mifsud, Michael  To:
ygData.messageBody:
Look around, on web sites. It is there. Verant said it had been changed
from Paladin only
----- Original Message -----
From: Mifsud, Michael <Michael.Mifsud@...>
To: <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, June 02, 1999 2:41 AM
Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Firey Avenger


> From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
>
> Is this confirmed?
>
> Fiery Avenger any Warrior class can use????
>
> > ----------
> > From: Clancy Cashion[SMTP:tcashio3@...]
> > Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Sent: Tuesday, June 01, 1999 10:36 PM
> > To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Firey Avenger
> >
> > From: "Clancy Cashion" <tcashio3@...>
> >
> > That was changed from beta. Other classes can use the Firey Avenger.
It
> > was orginially planned for Paladin only but changed
> >
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> With more than 18 million e-mails exchanged daily...
> http://www.onelist.com
> ...ONElist is THE place where the world talks!
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> For the Honor and Glory of the Warlord, Rallos Zek!
